_source.text: 73 An imaging study 74 found that they could predict sales data for songs by measuring activation in the ventral striatum (a very low-level part of the brain, strongly linked with emotions & weakly linked to instincts), and predict better than asking the participants what song they liked.

text: in the **ventral** **striatum** (a very low-level part of the brain, strongly linked with emotions & weakly
linked to instincts), and predict **better** **than** asking the participants what song they liked.
